price: I među znakovima Njegovim su i lađe nalik na brda koje morem plove.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ ٱلۡجَوَارِ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi al-jawāri fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
